value.title: Google AI scientist Bengio resigns after colleagues' firings: email
value.excerpt: Google research manager Samy Bengio said on Tuesday he was resigning, according to an internal email seen by Reuters, in a blow to the Alphabet Inc unit after the firings of his colleagues who questioned paper review and diversity practices.
